definitions.definition: Such as one may avail oneself of; capable of being used for the accomplishment of a purpose.

definitions.example: The list shows the available products in the store.

definitions.definition: Having sufficient power, force, or efficacy to achieve the purpose; availing, effective.
Free to meet someone, speak on the telephone, enter a romantic relationship or the like.
definitions.example: Hi, this is Mark Smith calling. Is your mother available?
